title: Interpretation of a dream about banknotes for one girl

preview.html: Seeing paper money in a dream carries many interpretations and interpretations, some good and others ominous. These interpretations vary depending on how the money is treated. Was he seen lying on the ground or being carried in his hand? And other things.. Here is the interpretation of a dream of paper money for a girl. Interpretation of a dream of a bowling girl with paper money. A general woman sees paper money in a dream, which indicates that she is a very ambitious girl who always seeks to achieve a certain goal and will achieve it, God willing. If you see that you are spending bills in a dream for a bowl woman, this symbolizes Until a bad event will happen soon in her life. Seeing a football player finding a banknote indicates that she will face a lot of trouble soon. When a woman sees a bowl of paper money in a dream outside her house, it means that she will soon be happy to remove the big problems that she was experiencing If a girl sees in her dream that she is taking money from someone, it means that she will get married soon. When a woman sees a pot in her dream that she is stealing money from someone, it means that she is in great danger and needs to be careful. Seeing money in a woman’s dream indicates She is suffering from constant pressure. The appearance of money in a woman’s dream is a sign that she has achieved the goal that she wanted so badly. When a woman sees in her dream a bowl of banknotes flying over and over her in large quantities from everywhere, this warns her of many dangers. Interpretation of a bowling girl’s dream With paper moneyInterpretation of seeing banknotes in a dreamSeeing banknotes in a dream symbolizes new opportunities in a career and success at work. Dreaming of banknotes in hand means that the dreamer will receive a very lucrative offer. If one sees in his dream that he is forced to give up his money, then this It indicates that one of his colleagues is trying to steal his idea. A dream about paper money can predict a major misunderstanding and dispute between the fortuneteller and another person. Whoever thinks that he is very rich and has a lot of money, this indicates that he will face great financial difficulties in his real life. Seeing a group of money foreshadowed The scattered banknotes of the master have some small problems with him when he carries out his plans. If one sees a lot of paper money in his dream, this is a sign that his wishes will come true. If you see papers in your dream, this foretells that you will have a trip soon. What does a dream mean where you see banknotes Seeing banknotes in a wallet in a dream symbolizes unexpected expenses. To dream that you have banknotes on the street means failure in business. Seeing oneself lending money indicates the need to take responsibility towards another person. Dreaming of stealing money symbolizes a serious conflict. In the life of a fortune teller. Seeing hidden banknotes in a dream symbolizes the loss of a large sum of money or theft. Seeing oneself in pursuit of money symbolizes the dreamer’s loneliness and his struggle to build relationships. Seeing old banknotes in a dream symbolizes that the student has been deceived by his loved ones. New banknotes in a dream symbolize...

title: Interpretation of a dream about rhinoplasty in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about rhinoplasty in a dream: People do not like the shape of their nose and want to change the shape and perform plastic surgery on the nose for the change they desire. Interpretation of a dream about rhinoplasty in a dream: Seeing rhinoplasty in a married woman’s dream is an indication of her good qualities towards her husband and family. And her neighbors. Seeing a rhinoplasty is joy and happiness for the seeker and good news for him. Rhinoplasty in a dream is a sign of getting rid of obstacles and problems that surround the dreamer’s life. In a married woman’s dream, plastic surgery indicates that she often leaves the marital home despite her husband’s disapproval. When a person sees that his nose is cut off in a dream while he is sick, this may indicate that one’s life is imminent and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about uterine surgery in a dream When a woman sees that she will undergo surgery on her uterus, this indicates that she has overcome the barriers and obstacles between her and Her dreams. Seeing a woman undergoing surgery on the uterus is evidence of the fulfillment of her desires and aspirations. In a man’s dream, when he sees that a woman near him needs surgery on her abdomen, this indicates his salvation from the problems and worries that haunt his life. Preparing for a hysterectomy in a dream indicates To anxiety and tension that will affect her outlook in life. A dream about a man bleeding in a woman’s dream indicates her despair in achieving what she desires due to her failure many times in achieving her goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about entering an operating room in a dream: Seeing yourself entering an operating room in a dream is an indication of The good and proper performance of things in the dreamer’s life. Seeing surgery in a dream indicates the health of the dreamer. In a dream, surgery indicates a change and development that may occur in one’s entire life. When a patient sees that he is entering the operating room, it will be good news for recovery from his illness and relief of his pain. Entering the operating room in a dream is evidence of the revelation of the secrets that the dreamer is hiding in his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about vaginal surgery in a dream: Seeing yourself undergoing vulvar surgery in a dream indicates the anguish and distress in which the dreamer lives. Undergoing vulvar surgery in a dream means that you You will be freed from restrictions and pain and God will relieve him of his worries. A married man who sees himself undergoing surgery for hemorrhoids in his sleep is good news for opening the door to the abundance of livelihood and goodness that the student will receive. Hemorrhoid surgery in a dream is an indication of the inheritance that the student will receive and did not expect to receive. Therefore. When a person sees a woman’s vagina in a dream, this portends happiness, prosperity, and bliss, and that the person who has the vision will live his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about back surgery in a dream. Surgery on the back of a dream indicates the many problems and fears that he suffers from in his life. Back surgery in a dream is an indicator On the physical and psychological illnesses that he suffers from. Seeing someone undergoing back surgery in a dream is an indication of troubled family relations between the situation.

title: Fear of a gecko in a dream

preview.html: But we will see what this dream carries in the world of dreams, and in this article we will present from our website gptafser.com/ the interpretation of this vision, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing fear of a gecko in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees a gecko in a dream, it warns her that one of her relatives It will hurt her. In case one girl kills a gecko in her sleep. Good news that she will be free from the suffering she has endured in her life. In case the gecko runs away from him in a dream. This dream is a warning to her that she should be careful in the love she is about to make With it. Seeing a gecko in a dream can be a sign that a girl will meet a person who is not honest with her. Perhaps he treats her in a hypocritical way and needs to be careful in dealing with her. Whoever sees a gecko in her dream is only a sign that she is close to people who have a bad character. Slut. Here he must take the precaution so as not to influence her. A gecko in a single woman’s dream could be a sign for her that there is someone who hates her and does not wish her well and is following her. Perhaps he wants to have an influence, according to Ibn Sirin. The failure of the girl in the dream while she is trying Escaping from a gecko in large numbers. This symbolizes that he is surrounded by many bad friends. Seeing a gecko near a girl, but she is unable to stay away from her. This dream indicates the psychological problems she suffers from because of an evil man entering her life and leaving her. In another meaning, seeing fear Of a gecko in a dream. It indicates that this girl needs help and support so that she can overcome the problems and trials that came her way. Seeing a weight wrapping around one girl in a dream. It can be a warning about the sins he is committing and actions that are not pleasing to God. She is also one who has no religion or good morals. Because she is not committed to religion and morals. See also: A gecko in a dream. Good news. Interpretation of seeing the fear of a gecko in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a gecko in a dream. It indicates the problems that she will face in her married life. Or living, as she suffers from understanding her family, and God knows best. In the event that the woman is close to killing the gecko. This dream symbolizes that she will be able to overcome the problems and troubles she has faced. It will bring many and wide benefits to her, God willing. Seeing a gecko in a dream for a troubled married woman may be a sign of the presence of a problem that is not... It is easy to fall for her. Killing a gecko in a dream is good for her, because it gives her good news that she will be able to solve the problems she faces. When a married woman appears in a dream with black color inside her bedroom. It may indicate marital problems that threaten the stability of her life. Fear of saying goodbye to A married woman’s dream: Inside her house there is a strong warning that there is someone trying to create problems between her and her husband. She should beware of whoever enters her house and pray a lot to God to keep evil away from her. She can see the fear of geckos in her dreams. It is only a sign that he is a religious person. .She also likes to be always

title: Interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream or a dream through the vision website roy2a.com, in normal circumstances, when wearing clothes, they must be clean and in good condition, so that the general appearance is appropriate, because seeing dirty clothes or wearing seeing them causes feelings of distress and dissatisfaction for their owner as well as For others. Seeing dirty clothes in a dream carries many meanings that are often unpleasant for the dreamer, and interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream depending on the dreamer’s condition and circumstances and whether he is a single man or woman, married or unmarried. Pregnant today, through the Ruya website, we will refer to the interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing dirty clothes in a dream It shows that the dreamer is committing It is a sin and a great sin. Seeing dirty clothes in a dream indicates problems and crises that the viewer will face in the coming period. Seeing dirty clothes in a dream indicates that the dreamer desires to repent to Almighty God and give up everything that might arouse God’s wrath upon him. See also: Interpretation of Ki’s vision Clothes in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing dirty clothes in a dream indicates many arguments, quarrels, and the breakup of intimate relationships or separation from a partner. Seeing dirty clothes in a dream indicates unpleasant news that the dreamer will hear in the near future. Seeing dirty clothes In a dream, it indicates the dreamer’s desire to end his quarrel with someone and return to his good relationship as it was. See also: What is the interpretation of seeing proper clothes in a dream? What is the interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream for a man: A man seeing dirty clothes in a dream indicates exhaustion, difficulties and adversity that He will face it in his life, and the sadness and delusion that he will find. Seeing a man with dirty clothes in a dream is walking on the path of misguidance, bad behavior and immoral actions. Seeing a man with dirty clothes in a dream can indicate attempts by people who hate God to harm and hurt him. Seeing a man soiling clothes with mud in a dream expresses dissatisfaction. Others towards him and what they say about him is ugly and bad. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bag of clothes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dirty clothes in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman soiling her clothes in a dream indicates the bad psychological state that controls her due to the many problems in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that she is soiling her clothes. A married woman in a dream soils her clothes with mud. It indicates people who talk badly about her and her bad behavior with each other. Seeing a single woman cleaning her dirty laundry in a dream shows that something happy will happen in her life such as engagement or marriage soon. Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman cleaning her parents’ clothes The dirty woman says that she is fair with them and treats them well. See also: Interpretation of seeing the mother’s closet

preview.html: We will learn about the solution to nightmares and bad dreams through your website gptafser.com/, so stay tuned. Reasons for seeing nightmares in a dream Excessive anxiety and thinking about life and the future are among the most common causes of nightmares, bad dreams, and mood disorders. Mental and physical exhaustion and the bad fluctuations that occur with it During the day. Or mixing with negative people in his workplace or study. Seeing frightening or unbeautiful scenes that upset his mood and change his psyche for the worse. The death of a person, perhaps a first-degree relative or a close friend, left a bad impression on him. And the fear of losing someone Its dimension plays a big role in the occurrence of nightmares. Watching really suspicious situations such as images of blood and murder, especially images of children in wars. Repeated scenes were published on the Internet, causing great shock to the viewer himself. Eating a lot of very hot foods and eating a lot of pepper plays a big role In the occurrence of disturbing nightmares. Excessive fatty foods cause discomfort and thus shorten sleep periods due to disturbing dreams. Consumption of alcoholic beverages in high levels negatively affects the work of the brain. Thus, studies have proven that people who drink alcohol are more susceptible to nightmares. Some types of medications can They affect the psyche and sleep, and the person may suffer from disorders. Medications such as high temperatures and influenza affect dreams negatively. See also: When a dream comes true after seeing it. The correct solutions to get rid of nightmares. Commitment to reading the Qur’an and memories before sleeping, and increasing the glorification, seeking forgiveness, and the Holocaust. It is desirable to read a verse The chair before going to sleep. On the authority of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, that he used to recite Surat An-Nas and Al-Falaq for the third time and blow on his hands. And wipe his body as much as he could before sleeping for a while. Try to take a rest after work, and do not stress too much and take a rest from time to time. For another. Do not sleep directly when feeling tired and anxious, it is necessary to relax a little and then sleep. Avoid any spicy food before bed or increase it during the day. Reduce the percentage of fat in the body by limiting fatty foods, especially two hours before bed. Avoid negative thinking and feel positive And optimism in life so that he gives himself the necessary rest and does not negatively affect his sleep. Avoid sitting alone to get rid of negative thoughts or sad memories of the past. Do more exercises on a daily basis, because movement. And sports help to replenish energy and motivation, as well as feel comfortable and positive. Diagnosis of the person Who suffers from nightmares: There is no such thing as a test to examine or diagnose a person suffering from nightmares. However, with an increase in agitation and lack of sleep for sufficient periods, you must go to the doctor to find a solution to this problem and help you get rid of it. The doctor conducts a comprehensive examination of the body to find out the real reason behind it. These nightmares, and after the examination is completed, the doctor discovers the cause. It may not be the body or the disease related

title: The water cycle in a dream

preview.html: Today we will learn with you the interpretation of seeing a toilet in a dream for men and women through this topic, so follow us to learn more through gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing a toilet in a dream for one girl. Entering the bathroom with an unknown person in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her future marriage, and God knows best. Vision A clogged toilet with a rash in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a difficult period in his life. It is said that a clogged toilet in a dream is a sign of delayed marriage for single women and they may never get married. Entering the bathroom with a lover in a dream is evidence that this person has bad character. It should be avoided immediately. See also: Interpretation of dreams about entering the bathroom with someone I know. Interpretation of seeing the toilet in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the toilet in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her suffering from confusion and great doubt about her husband’s money. And whoever enters the bathroom to relieve himself in front of people, a big secret may be revealed. In her life, it changes people’s perception of her. When a married woman sees in her dream that her husband enters a public bathroom, she will have many female relationships. Interpretation of seeing a toilet in a dream for a man and its meaning. The bathroom cycle in a person’s dream represents the death of worry and anxiety, the beginning of relief and the coming of sustenance, God willing. When a man dreams of a clean toilet with a pleasant smell. It is a sign of a wife’s good obedience to her husband. Entering a broken or broken toilet in a dream means that the dreamer is suffering from bad financial circumstances in his life. Whoever enters an unclean toilet in a dream and his clothes are stuck to garbage and dirt. He has the right to put himself In a place of suspicion, and he may accompany those with a bad reputation and morals, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a chair in the toilet in a dream. The meaning and interpretation of seeing the toilet in a pregnant woman’s dream. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream as if she is going to the bathroom to relieve herself. This is a sign that her birth is near and will be easy. And it is normal, God willing. Seeing an abandoned and worn out toilet in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of a difficult and problematic birth. Whoever sees in a dream that she is giving birth in the bathroom, it is an unpleasant dream and expresses that the fetus will be harmed. Seeing a dirty toilet in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates many problems. Between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing a toilet in a dream for young men and its meaning. When a young man dreams of a toilet and urinates in it, this is a sign of his upcoming marriage. When a young man sees in his dream that he is bathing in the toilet, God has blessed him with good offspring, boys and girls. Going to the toilet or bathing in dirty toilets in a dream Evidence of forbidden relationships, and God knows best. Seeing a bathroom in a toilet indicates the rejection of worries and sorrows and the arrival of relief, God willing. title: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming from the head by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head could be a reference to multiple interpretations related to the dreamer’s life, and they are precisely determined by what the viewer says. A person may dream of blood coming out of his head due to a wound, or he may dream of a scalp from which blood is flowing, and there are those who dream of blood coming out of another person’s head. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the headThe interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head can herald the patient’s salvation from the disease in The near future and once again enjoy stability in life. A dream of blood coming out of the head may indicate a new beginning for the dreamer in life, and therefore he should be optimistic and work hard to improve his situation and feel more comfortable than before. Also, a dream of blood coming out of the front of the head could It is evidence of the dreamer’s efforts to get rid of the annoying things in his life, and here it is recommended to continue trying and pray to God Almighty for a peaceful life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head according to the scholar Ibn Sirin could be an indicator There are some negative thoughts in the dreamer’s head, which he must try to get rid of as quickly as possible by thinking positively and remembering God Almighty, or the dream may be of blood bleeding from the head. The head is evidence of the necessity of paying attention to the religious aspect, getting closer to God Almighty in word and deed, and staying away from taboos. As for a dream of blood that bleeds for someone who is suffering from problems in his life, it can symbolize the immediate rejection of these problems. Only the dreamer should not hesitate to make an effort and continue the struggle. To reach stability, such as a dream of blood coming out of the head, can indicate the extent of ambitions that the dreamer wants to achieve, and therefore he must plan them well, work hard and diligently, and pray to God a lot for what he wants to happen, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the head for a woman Single: Seeing blood flowing from the head in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate bad thoughts that have surrounded her for a while, and that she should try to clear her mind of these thoughts so that the mind can rest and calm her or the dream. The blood that bleeds from the head may symbolize the visionary’s need to continue the struggle for salvation, and his problems with the ideal solutions that will make him return to stability again. The girl may dream of copious blood bleeding from her head, and here the dream of blood from her head indicates a feeling of failure and inability. On reaching success, here the dreamer should not give up and despair, but rather he should work again and ask. God Almighty’s help. As for in a dream, bad blood comes out of the head, as it can warn the dreamer that there is a person who is not good in her life, and that she should seek advice from God Almighty regarding her relationship with him. Before things get worse and suffering increases, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming from the head for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of bleeding from her head may be evidence that she is hiding some things from her husband and lying to him, and this is not good for her so she should stay away from him as quickly as possible and repent to God Almighty. Coming soon situation

title: Interpretation of the color beige in a dream. The meaning of the color beige in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the color beige for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether she is wearing a long short dress, shoes, shirt, skirt, blouse, or hijab, cream, golden, light or dark brown and more according to Ibn Sirin. Beige. Seeing the color beige in a dream heralds good news and blessings, especially for unmarried people. It indicates the relief and provision of good marriage for girls, it indicates an increase in the number of applicants for marriage, and ultimately providing them with a good marriage. Hence, it will be loved and appreciated by everyone. If you see the color beige in a dream or dreams, it symbolizes the basic and necessary things.Beige can also symbolize your neutral attitude towards a problem in your real life. It is the color of flour or flour. It is a good symbol in which good is beautiful. It signifies nutrition and the ability to live and work. It may indicate a long-term matter to be carried out or harvested and accomplished. Seeing a cream/beige color in a dream A good vision indicates the passage of a beautiful romantic period. The dreamer takes his affairs with an irrational thought, but he will also return to feelings and emotions. For single people, this indicates that they have taken during This period, the decision to marry, to get married, indicates that they lived a quiet life, for the sick, the effects of the disease will end slowly and he will return to his daily routine that he was accustomed to doing easily and thus he will recover after a short time and his health will return. To him again and this vision indicates the emergence of some obstacles at work, especially in financial income, and therefore he must organize his work. Buying cream/beige clothes. It generally expresses the visionary’s perception of comfort and contentment, the flourishing of his feelings and emotions to a great extent, the improvement of his living conditions, and good luck. The visionary is in a bilateral relationship that has been between them for a period of time. But soon he will leave and they will spend a happy, happy life after that. It also indicates a life full of happiness, peaceful love, psychological comfort, and taking things from the positive aspects. See the wedding dress in cream/beige. The owner of the vision must be patient and diligent to achieve his will and goals in life. For single people, they should not rush into early marriage decisions. For married people, this indicates that they are facing some problems in their relationship. Psychological interpretation of seeing cream/beige color It indicates that there is not enough opportunity to make decisions, although the visionary has been seriously thinking about his life for a long time, but so far he will not be able to Making the right decisions. Seeing a beige wedding dress in a dream means that he is able to bring the visionary closer to what his heart desires and marry her, forming a beautiful and happy family, and things and life will go as he wanted and planned in the previous periods. Those moments are missing. Seeing a beige shirt in a dream indicates sustenance and wealth, as completing marriage or engagement and moving on to a happy and prosperous life, also indicates a person who is diligent in his work, and thus he will be able to reach the milestones and this is because he does not repeat his mistakes and benefits and learns from others.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake running after me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake running after me in a dream. We will present the following dream interpretation about a snake running after me in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations..Interpretation of a dream about a snake running after me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a snake running after me in a dream, and chasing snakes can be a sign of enemies, and God knows the unseen. The vision of a divorced woman may represent a snake running after her, as it may represent a problem, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a snake chasing the dreamer may express distress, and God knows best. When a married woman sees a snake chasing her, it may express difficulties, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a snake turning into a woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream A snake turning into a woman in a dream can represent a woman approaching a man, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees a snake turning into a woman, she can turn into a woman close to her husband, and God is Most High and KnowsAlso, seeing a person turning into a snake can indicate changes in the owner of the dream, and God knows best. UnseenInterpretation of a dream about a dead snake in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about the death of a snake in a dream Seeing a dead snake can represent salvation from evil, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees a dead snake in a dream, this may be evidence of her liberation from evil, God willing. When a young man sees a dead snake, it may be That is a sign of his freedom from sadness, and God knows best. If a married man sees a dead snake in a dream, he can express a mood of problems, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a golden snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a golden snake in a dream can be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a snake made of gold, he may It indicates good deeds, God willing. When a married woman sees a golden snake in a dream, this could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. Also, the vision of touching a smooth snake could indicate a treasure for the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a snake attacking me in a dream. It indicates an enemy who is planning to harm him, and God knows best. When you see a snake attacking me in a dream, it may be a sign of his enemy, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a snake attacking her, she may become an enemy to her, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. While seeing a snake can express enemies and envy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating a sea snake. In a dreamInterpretation of a dream that you are eating a snake In a dream, a dream about eating a sea snake can indicate a good change and that God has all knowledge. When you see yourself eating a sea snake in a dream, this can be a sign of good changes and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating a snake in a dream This may indicate good changes, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also express seeing a sea snake being cooked, and it can indicate changes occurring in his life, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of seeing yourself eating snake meat in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of seeing eating snake meat in a dream. Eating a cooked snake could It may be a sign of goodness, God willing

title: Interpretation of a dream about falling

preview.html: Today we will present to you the interpretation of a dream about falling. Most of us are often exposed to the situation in which when we sleep after a few minutes we wake up that we are falling from a height and touching the ground, and this situation is repeated more than once, and we do not know its interpretation, and this vision carries many signs that many are looking to know what it means. Many people are wondering about this vision, so today we will present it to you. The interpretation of seeing a dream of falling in this article in the encyclopedia through the following lines.Interpretation of a dream of falling. Interpretation of a dream of falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin sees that if a person sees in his dream that he is falling from a high place, This is a sign that the dreamer will enter a new phase in his life. However, if a person sees in his dream that he is falling from a height and suffers from many injuries, this indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many crises, misfortunes and problems in his life. And whoever sees in his dream that he is falling from a place in... A defect in religion, then this is evidence that this person will commit sins and temptations. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that he falls into a mosque, this indicates that this person will abandon his sins; Because he did a good deed. If a person sees himself falling in his dream from top to bottom, this is evidence of a change in circumstances from good to bad. If a person sees that he fell into water in his dream, this is evidence of abundant goodness and contentment. But if the dreamer sees that he falls At the bottom, this indicates that misfortunes will befall him. If one sees in his dream that there is someone pushing him from above, this indicates that this person is treacherous and betrays him. But if one sees himself falling from the sky in his dream, this is an indication that this person has an attitude Bad and forgets the afterlife and thinks about the world. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen’s dream: Whoever dreams of someone falling on him, this indicates that his enemy will defeat him. If a person sees in his dream that he fell as a result of someone hitting him, this means that he has fallen into a calamity. If a person sees in his dream that he is falling from a place High, like a wall or a mountain, this is a sign that he will not be able to achieve what he seeks. Interpretation of a dream about falling in love with a single girl. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is falling, this means that she is entering a new stage, and that she will leave celibacy, and become engaged, and if she She is engaged and will get married soon. If an unmarried girl sees herself falling from a high place to an unknown place, this is evidence that she is suffering from instability, worries, and tension, but if the place is known to her, this is evidence that she will begin a new phase in her life and she is happy. Interpretation A dream in which she fell in love with a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is falling from a height, this indicates imminent despair. Falling is a sign of the passing of her youth. But if a married woman, who is newly married, sees that she is falling asleep, this is a sign that she will not have children, but if she has children, this indicates However, she will not give birth again. Interpretation of a dream in which she fell in love with a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of a miscarriage, this is a sign that she will give birth to a boy. However, if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she fell from a height and sustained some wounds, this indicates that her birth will be difficult and painful.
